name: Release Plan
description: Release Plan to be performed during the release itself

tests.name: Write the release notes
tests.description: Under `docs/source/releases/` create a new .rst file describing the release changes. Also, add the new release to the list of releases at `docs/source/releases/index.rst`. Look at the sprint issues and PRs on GitHub, specially the ones with the `comment-on-sprint-review` label. Commit your changes directly in the master branch.

tests.name: Check secrets are set in GitHub
tests.description: The secrets required by the GitHub Action must be set before running. Go to https://github.com/avocado-framework/avocado/settings/secrets/actions and check 'Repository secrets', there should be four tokens set and not expired: RELEASE_TOKEN, RTD_TOKEN and the tokens for twine/pypi.org PYPI_USER and PYPI_PASSWD.

tests.name: Run GitHub Action 'Release
tests.description:
Run the GitHub Action 'Release' on the master branch at https://github.com/avocado-framework/avocado/actions/workflows/release.yml . All the jobs must pass. This action will update the `master` branch and a tag `VERSION`.
IMPORTANT NOTE: the automatic tag won't be signed anymore by the release developer.

tests.name: Update the Fedora and EPEL RPM packages and module
tests.description:
Follow the instructions on:

https://avocado-framework.readthedocs.io/en/latest/guides/contributor/chapters/releasing.html#how-to-refresh-fedora-epel-modules

and work with the package maintainer by sending a PR to update the Avocado version on the `avocado:latest` stream.

tests.name: Update website
tests.description: Update https://github.com/avocado-framework/avocado-framework.github.io/blob/master/index.md and add the new release.

tests.name: Send e-emails
tests.description: Send the e-email with the release notes to avocado-devel and virt-test-devel.
